cards.paragraph: In the field for many years, I recently decided to use my knowledge to develop websites, becoming a web designer. I usually work with methodological approaches, going to meet cusotmer needs with good UIs.

cards.title: Design
cards.paragraph: I like to experiment with different styles and layouts, mantaining the right balance between the artistic and functional parts. I'm always on the lookout for new structures and typography, keeping abreast of trends.

cards.paragraph: I have the right software and hardware tools to develop performant and secure websites. My background allows me to have a broad knowledge of computer science, both the programming side and the internet side.
